nodes.text: Leeya was an empress who allied her dominion, the Regency Worlds, with the Galactic Empire. Due to the alliance, the Empire granted moderate taxation and permitted the Regency Worlds a degree of sovereignty.

Empress Leeya was first mentioned in Dawn of Rebellion, a canon roleplaying 2018 sourcebook that is based on Star Wars Rebels and Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The book was published by Fantasy Flight Games and was authored by John Dunn, Tom Sorenson, Sterling Hershey, Jonathan Julius, Keith Ryan Kappel, Tim Huckelberry, Jason Marker, and James M. Spahn.
